channel.title: Development on GEOS
channel.description: Recent content in Development on GEOS

item.title: Project Steering Committee
item.description: The GEOS project is run by a Project Steering Committee made up of developers and contributors to the project and is a project of OSGeo. Major project decisions are made via a Request for Comments (RFC) process, where proposals are first documented and then voted on by the steering committee. This PSC list is valid as of November 10, 2021. Sandro Santilli (chair) Martin Davis Howard Butler Regina Obe Dale Lutz Paul Ramsey Dan Baston The PSC approves major changes and RFC documents.
